entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @JaniceDean @mschlapp @NYGovCuomo As the Left was bashing POTUS for his Coronavirus White House news conferences, Cuomo stole the format, maximized the self-praise, but made the most tragic, Left-inspired, management error of putting political correctness over public safety in his nursing home mandates.
